## Setting up data

We are setting up counts data, but have to remove columns that are not counts. 

```{r}
data <- example_data() %>%
  dplyr::select(c("Day00_RepA", "Day05_RepA", "Day22_RepA", "Day22_RepB", "Day22_RepC")) %>%
  as.matrix()
  
counts_data <- setup_data(data)
```
